title: UNHCR NorthernEurope
subtitle:
Currently, 70.8 million people have been forcibly displaced as a result of persecution, conflict, violence, & human rights violations. Double the amount compared to 20 years ago.

It is important to know the facts. 
Download UNHCR's 10 facts on #refugees https://bit.ly/2ZbOqsd pic.twitter.com/2IuVSmWop7
